name: Ray of Hope
effects: Cure all status effects for all allies

name: Ray of Hope
希望之光
희망의 빛
Rayon d'espoir
Strahl der Hoffnung
Rayo de esperanza
desc_short: Cure poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies
治療全體隊員的中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化狀態
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 회복
Soigne poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, et confusion, maladie et pétrification pour tous les alliés
Heilt Gift/ Blenden/ Schlaf/ Stille/ Lähmung/ Konfus/ Virus/ Stein, alle Verb.
Elimina cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie de todos los aliados
desc_long: Cures poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone for all allies.
治療全體隊員的中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化狀態。
아군 전체의 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화를 회복합니다.
Soigne pois., céc., som., sil., para., conf., mala. et pétri. pour tous les alliés
Heilt Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein bei allen Verb.
Elimina cura ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie de todos los aliados
